summary: This document contains Know Your Customer (KYC) information related to various accounts associated with Jeffrey Epstein and his affiliates. It details account ownership, purposes, expected inflows and outflows, and the individuals involved in managing these accounts. The document highlights Epstein's financial activities and relationships with various entities and individuals. This document contains details regarding various legal entities associated with Jeffrey Epstein, including their financial profiles, management structures, and relationships with Deutsche Bank. It highlights the roles of Epstein and his associates in these entities, as well as the financial activities and risk assessments related to them.

connections.description: Darren Indyke serves as the treasurer for Epstein's foundation, indicating a direct employment relationship.
Stewart Oldfield manages accounts for Epstein, indicating a client-service provider relationship.
Both are involved in the financial management of Epstein's accounts, indicating a professional association.
Jeffrey Epstein is the president while Darren Indyke serves as the treasurer, indicating a direct employer-employee relationship within the organization.
Jeffrey Epstein, as president, oversees Erka Kellerhals, who serves as secretary, indicating a hierarchical relationship.
Harry Beller is a signatory on accounts related to Epstein's entities, indicating a working relationship.
Both serve in management roles within Gratitude America, indicating a collaborative working relationship.

events.title: Account Opening Request
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein reached out to Stewart Oldfield to open a new account under Zorro Management LLC.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, B3 St. Thomas 00802 U.S.
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is the president of Southern Financial LLC and has multiple accounts managed by Deutsche Bank.
Darren Indyke is the treasurer for Gratitude America Ltd, which is a 501(c)(3) foundation.
Harry Beller is an accountant associated with Epstein's financial activities.
The document outlines various accounts, including Gratitude America Ltd, Neptune LLC, and NES LLC, detailing their purposes and expected financial activities.
Gratitude America is a private investment foundation funded by Jeffrey Epstein.
The foundation has estimated gross receipts of $500,000 per annum and investable assets between $2 million and $5 million.
Neptune, LLC is a single-member LLC solely owned by Jeffrey Epstein, created to manage expenses related to his NYC home.
NES, LLC is also a single-member LLC owned by Epstein, established for managing expenses associated with one of his homes.
Darren Indyke is noted for having negative media mentions related to properties but not for any individual wrongdoing.
